entry.title: Armenia takes part in Western-backed Ukraine peace talks

media:group.media:title: Armenia takes part in Western-backed Ukraine peace talks
media:group.media:description:
๐ Armeniaโs opposition attempted to call a vote to open an impeachment hearing into Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, but failed to meet quorum after members of the ruling Civil Contract party boycotted the session. Without quorum, no votes can be held. ๐ Former Economy Minister Vahan Kerobyan was freed from house arrest, but remains charged in a corruption case involving Synergy, one of Armeniaโs largest IT firms. ๐ A delegation of U.S. State Department officials and mayors arrived in Armenia to launch a first-of-its-kind Local Democracy Forum and set up new sister city connections. ๐ Armenia took part in Western-backed peace talks on Ukraine, but declined to sign on to a final communique. Russia was not invited to the summit in Switzerland.
Credits: Ruptly

media:group.media:description:
ิปีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีพีกึีธึีตีฉ ีซึีกีฏีกีถีกึีถีธีฒ ีดีกึีดีถีซีถ ยซีธีน ีดีซ ีทีกีถีฝ ีนีซ ีฟีกีฌีซีฝยป, ีธึ ีกีดีขีธีฒีปีกีฏีกีถ ีธึ ีกีถีกีนีกีผ ึีถีถีฅีถ ีฐีธึีถีซีฝีซ 12-ีซ ีขีกีญีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีคีฅีบึีฅึีจ, ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ีซึีกีพีกีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถ ีีซีถีก ิฟีกึีกีบีฅีฟีตีกีถึีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิณึีธึีฃ ินีธีฝีธึีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีดึ ีึีก ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ิฑีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีชีธีฒีธีพีซ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐีจ ีฐีธึีถีซีฝีซ 12-ีซ ีขีกีญีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌ ีฃีถีกีฐีกีฟีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึ ีง ีฐีถีนีฅึึีฅีฌี ึีถีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีคีฅีผ ีนีฝีฏีฝีกีฎึ ีีซีถีก ิฟีกึีกีบีฅีฟีตีกีถึีซ ีฐีกีดีธีฆีดีกีดีขี ีีซีฏีธีฌ ีีกีทีซีถีตีกีถีซีถ ีฐีกีปีธีฒีพีฅึ ีบีกีผีกีฏีฟีฅีฌ ีถีกึ ึีกีฒีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจึ

entry.title: Armenia silent as Russia says working to restore Mir payment card services: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS

media:group.media:title: Armenia silent as Russia says working to restore Mir payment card services: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS
media:group.media:description:
๐ Armeniaโs Central Bank this week cut interest rates by 25 basis points to 8%, as inflation continues to remain well below target levels. ๐ The Central Bank neither confirmed nor denied that Russia is working to restore access to Mir, its national payment system, in Armenia. In March, almost all of Armeniaโs banks moved to block Mir transactions, citing U.S. sanctions. ๐ Armeniaโs antimonopoly watchdog greenlit the sale of HSBC Armenia to Ardshinbank, moving the deal one step closer to completion. The Central Bank must still sign off.

entry.title: Belarus armed Azerbaijan for war against Armenia, POLITICO reports

media:group.media:title: Belarus armed Azerbaijan for war against Armenia, POLITICO reports
media:group.media:description:
๐ POLITICO Europe reported yesterday that leaked documents confirm Belarus delivered advanced weapons to Azerbaijan between 2018 and 2022 which were then used against Armenia. ๐ Armenia denied three separate claims in the last three days that it fired at Azerbaijani positions. Lawyers for Ruben Vardanyan sent an urgent appeal to the United Nations over his alleged torture in Azerbaijani captivity. ๐ Local and international journalist groups condemn police violence at Wednesdayโs protest outside parliament which saw at least 12 reporters injured.

entry.title: How Armenia is joining the space race

media:group.media:title: How Armenia is joining the space race
media:group.media:description:
In this interview, Babken Der Grigoryan, founder and CEO of Kartes Analytica discusses Armenia's ambitious plans to develop an advanced national space program, examining its recent landmark participation in the Artemis Accords. He analyzes the strategic and economic importance of the burgeoning Armenian space sector, as well as its implications for national security.

ีีธึีฝีกีดีตีก ีีฅีคีกีตีซ ีดีธีฟ ีฅึีฏีธึ ีฟีกึีซ ีกีผีกีป ีถีฅีตึีธีขีฌีกีฝีฟีธีดีก ีง ีกีญีฟีธึีธีทีพีฅีฌ, ีธึ ึีธึึีซีฏีถ ีกึีคีฅีถ ีฅึีฏีธึ ีฟีกึีซ ีงี ีบีกีตึีกึีธึีด ีง ีคึีก ีคีฅีดึ ีีกีญีฏีซีถีธึีด ีกีผีธีฒีปีกีฏีกีถ ีธึึีง ีญีถีคีซึ ีนีธึีถีฅึีกีฎ ีีฅีคีกีถ ีฅึีฏีกึ ีธึ ีฎีกีถึ ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐ ีง ีกีถึีฅีฌึ ิฑีฒีปีซีฏีถ ีกีผีกีปีซีถีถ ีงึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด, ีธึ ีฅึีฏีกึ ีขีธึีชีธึีดีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีถีกึ ีซีดีธึีถีกีฉีฅึีกีบีซีก ีง ีฝีฟีกึีฅีฌ, ีธึีจ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถีธึีด, ีคีฅีฒีธึีกีตึีซ ีฉีกีถีฏีกึีชีฅึ ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีธีพ, ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีนีงึ ีซึีกีฏีกีถีกึีพีธึีดึ ิดีฅีฒีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ ีฅีฏีฅีฌ ยซีีซีฉีซ ึ ึ ีีดีกีตีฌยป ีขีกึีฅีฃีธึีฎีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ีปีกีถึีฅึีธีพึ ิฑีตีฝึ ึ ีกึีคีฅีถ ีคึีกีฏีกีถ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีฏีก, ีธึ ีีฅีคีกีถ ึีกีฒึีฏีฅีฒีจ ีฐีกีฒีฉีกีฐีกึีฅีฌีธึ ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐีซีถ ีงึ
